Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The Forsaken Headquarters. Midnight.'}
{3: 'With the help of his crew, Watanabe safely returns to the Forsaken campsite.'}
{3: 'Greeting him there are the Forsaken soldiers and the three children who were sleeping.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Uncle Watanabe!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: '...Is the supplier not with you?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Huh? 【kuroname】is probably in the next trade port by now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: 'We wanted to give this to the supplier... We promised 【kuroname】... payment.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The anticipation on Ann's face quickly fades away. She lowers her head, her hands tugging the corners of her shirt, and she gets quiet."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Payment? Did you make a deal?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'N-no, not like that... The supplier helped us with the decorations.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So I've heard. You've done a great job.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "...Will the supplier return? A promise is a promise... It doesn't feel right to keep this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'It must be really exhausting to work so tirelessly for so long. We wanted to cheer up the supplier with a surprise.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: "...It's alright! A supplier has to travel and supply others as well, after all...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'And it was our fault for falling asleep without noticing. Well, the supplier gotta return and supply us in the future, right? We will do this next time!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I hate to break it to you, but I don't think our supplier's coming back for a while... But don't worry. I'll figure out what to do with your gift.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Now, as I promised, who wants to help me in the kitchen?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe rubs the children's heads one by one, trying to divert their attention."}
{3: 'Hearing that Watanabe is going to be cooking, they all become cheerful again.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{3: 'Snow has stopped falling with the night breeze, but the blushing sky seems to hint at another snowstorm on the horizon.'}
{3: "Under this backdrop, the rising smoke from the Forsaken camp is particularly notable. The fragrant scent of food lingers in the air, and their New Year's Eve celebration begins again."}
{3: 'Inside the Forsaken Headquarters kitchen.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's about it... We haven't received the scheduled call from Bianca and Karenina. They're supposed to pick up Commandant, but...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Relax. I've also put a tracker on 【kuroname】 earlier. I'll sync that data with you later.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not saying I trust you... But I'll be counting on you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So do I... Mr. Watanabe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The Forsaken do not forsake those who fought with us. Despite our differences, we will make sure our guest is safe. I'll contact you later.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having ended the call, Watanabe breathes a sigh of relief, taking off his apron and putting it aside.'}
{3: 'He opens the geolocation system again, confirming the location of his "supplier"—the exact same spot since a few hours ago, with no sign of movement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Tsk... Trouble. Although that's Babylonia territory...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe puts his fingers to his temples and groans.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "Uncle Watanabe! We're here to help!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "That's right! We're gonna help you clean the kitchen... Is something wrong? Then we're right where we should be!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'W-wait—have you cleaned the kitchen already?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seeing how eager to help they are, Watanabe suddenly comes up with an idea.'}
{3: 'If there is yet a solution for what is bothering him, then the children standing in front of him are the best odds he can get.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hey, kids, do you want to give our "supplier" your gift yourselves?', 4: '1'}
